mapper.select: select ANY_VALUE(m.member_id), ANY_VALUE(m.member_nickname), ANY_VALUE(m.member_profile_uuid), ANY_VALUE(m.member_profile_original_name), ANY_VALUE(m.member_profile_path), ANY_VALUE(m.member_profile_size), b.board_id, ANY_VALUE(b.board_title), ANY_VALUE(b.board_price), AVG(r.reply_score) as avg_reply_score, ANY_VALUE(r.reply_id) from tbl_member m join tbl_board b on m.member_id = b.member_id left join tbl_reply r on b.board_id = r.board_id group by b.board_id order by avg_reply_score desc

select m.member_id, m.member_nickname, m.member_profile_uuid, m.member_profile_original_name, m.member_profile_path, m.member_profile_size, b.board_id, b.board_title, bf.board_file_id, bf.board_file_original_name, bf.board_file_uuid, bf.board_file_path, bf.board_file_size from tbl_member m inner join tbl_board b on m.member_id = b.member_id left join tbl_board_file bf on b.board_id = bf.board_id order by b.board_register_date desc LIMIT 8

select m.member_id, m.member_nickname, m.member_profile_uuid, m.member_profile_original_name, m.member_profile_path, m.member_profile_size, b.board_id, b.board_title, bf.board_file_id, bf.board_file_original_name, bf.board_file_uuid, bf.board_file_path, bf.board_file_size from tbl_member m inner join tbl_board b on m.member_id = b.member_id left join tbl_board_file bf on b.board_id = bf.board_id where m.member_region = #{memberRegion} order by b.board_register_date desc LIMIT 8
